DataElement.preferredName: Cytotoxic Chemotherapy Maintenance Therapy Discontinued Prior Recurrent Disease Diagnosis Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: information related to the discontinuation of the anticancer drugs that kill cells used as a continuation of treatment for an extended period of time to prevent relapse prior to the  recognition of the presence of the return of a disease after a period of remission.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Cytotoxic Chemotherapy Maintenance Therapy Discontinued Prior Recurrent Disease Diagnosis
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the discontinuation of the anticancer drugs that kill cells used as a continuation of treatment for an extended period of time to prevent relapse prior to the  recognition of the presence of the return of a disease after a period of remission.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Anticancer drugs that kill cells, especially cancer cells.:Continuation of treatment for an extended period of time to prevent relapse.

Concepts.definition: A drug therapy that is used to destroy cancer cells.
Continuation of treatment for an extended period of time to prevent relapse.

Property.preferredDefinition: Discontinued; stopped permanently or temporarily.:Earlier in time or order.:The return of a disease after a period of remission.:The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.

Concepts.definition: To stop or end, permanently or temporarily.
The return of a disease after a period of remission.

The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms (NCI Glossary).

ValueDomain.preferredName: Cytotoxic Chemotherapy Maintenance Therapy Discontinued Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: information related to determining if the anticancer drugs that kill cells used as a continuation of treatment for an extended period of time to prevent relapse has stopped permanently or temporarily.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Anticancer drugs that kill cells, especially cancer cells.:Continuation of treatment for an extended period of time to prevent relapse.:Discontinued; stopped permanently or temporarily.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Continuation of treatment for an extended period of time to prevent relapse.
To stop or end, permanently or temporarily.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ReferenceDocuments.name: If the patient had cytotoxic
ReferenceDocuments.description: If the patient had cytotoxic maintenance chemotherapy, was the therapy discontinued for a minimum of 6 months prior to documentation of recurrent disease?
